title: PM Dahal's directive to speed up Federal Parliament Building construction
description: Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal has directed the bodies concerned to conclude the construction of the Federal Parliament Building quickly so that the Parliament's Winter Session could be held there.

title: 11 months of current fiscal year: BoP at surplus of Rs 228.98 billion
description: Balance of Payment (BOP) remained at a surplus of Rs.228.98 billion in the first eleven months of the current fiscal year 2022-23 that had begun on July 17, 2022 and is ending within a week.

title: TU equivalency issue exacerbating brain drain
description: Amidst the equivalency controversy, students and professionals residing across the globe have argued that TU's complex structural equivalency distribution policy is a major causes of brain drain from Nepal..
